Description: Limestone votive stela depicting an ibis before an offering-table; winged uraeus in upper right hand corner.
Bibliographic references: Stuttgart 2007 / Ägyptische Mumien : Unsterblichkeit im Land der Pharaonen (no. 257)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1983 Sep-Dec, Memphis, Art Gallery of Memphis, A Divine Tour of Ancient Egypt 2007-2008 6 Oct-24 Mar, Stuttgart, Württemberg State Museum, Agyptische Mumien: Botschafter aus dem Land der Pharaonen
